## Bio

Ethan Marcos Galindo Raya student of the Bachelor's Degree in Genomic Sciences
at National Autonomous University of Mexico (UNAM). Currently a research intern 
at FreyreLab, a laboratory mainly focused on bacterial regulation networks with
a systems biology approach. He'd like to develop synthetic and computational 
biology in topics like morphogenesis, gene regulation networks and bioremediation.
